DOC.brief_title: Surveillance Patients With Suspected Acute Myocardial Infarction That Receive Early Inhospital Thrombolysis With Metalyse
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Male female patient suspect myocardial infarction , e.g . transportation hospital ambulance . No patient young 18 year . Possibility obtain relevant information concern indication contraindication thrombolysis patient Typical chest pain duration 30 minute Definite infarction sign 12leadECG STelevation > 0.1 millivolt ( mV ) > 2 lead recent leave bundle branch block typical clinical sign Symptom onset < = 6 hour Exclusion criterion : Patients older 75 year ( exception : patient appear much young ) Low body weight No person 18 contraindication accord summary product characteristic ( SPC ) Metalyse
